meanings.definition: The ability to remember or recollect information.
meanings.sent1: Her recallabilities helped her ace the history test.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the recallabilities of different age groups.
meanings.sent3: The robot's recallabilities were so good, it never forgot a single detail.
meanings.sent4: His recallabilities were like a well-organized library, storing every memory neatly.
meanings.sent5: The detective's recallabilities were crucial in solving the mysterious case.

meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be remembered or recollected.
meanings.sent1: The book's plot had a high level of recallabilities.
meanings.sent2: The song's catchy tune increased its recallabilities.
meanings.sent3: The old photograph's recallabilities brought back fond memories.
meanings.sent4: The painting's vivid colors added to its recallabilities.
meanings.sent5: The movie's emotional scenes enhanced its recallabilities.
